text: Fernando Colunga Olivares () (born 3 March 1966) is a Mexican actor best known for his work in Mexican telenovelas. He received his drama education at Centro de Educación Artística de Televisa (CEA). He is mostly known for his appearance in different telenovelas. He also has some roles in movies bordcast in cinemas, and had a few roles as an actor in theatre productions. == Filmography == === Films === Year Title Role Country 1988 La guerrera vengadora Unknown role 1995 Bésame En La Boca Arturo 2007 Ladrón que roba a ladrón Alejandro Toledo 2008 The Wackness Jason 2009 Wild About Harry (2009 film) Danny 2015 The Wedding Ringer Jose 2015 Ladrones Alejandro Toledo === Television performances === Year Title Role Notes 1988 La Telaraña Unknown role {{ 1990 Cenizas y Diamantes Unknown role 1991 Alcanzar Una Estrella II Unknown role 1991 Madres Egoístas Jorge 1992 María Mercedes Chicho 1993 Más Allá del Puente Valerio 1994 Mujer, Casos de la Vida Real Unknown role Episode: "Te olvidaré" 1994 Marimar Adrián Rosales 1995 María la del Barrio Luis Fernando de la Vega Protagonist 1995 Alondra Raúl Gutiérrez 1997 Esmeralda José Armando Peñarreal De Velasco Protagonist 1998 La Usurpadora Carlos Daniel Bracho Protagonist 1998 Más Allá de la Usurpadora Carlos Daniel Bracho Television film Protagonist 1999 Cuento de Navidad Jaime Rodríguez Coder 1999 Nunca Te Olvidaré Luis Gustavo Uribe Del Valle Protagonist 2000 Abrázame muy fuerte Carlos Manuel Rivero Protagonist 2001 Navidad sin fin Pedro 2002 XHDRbZ José Episode: "Una de lobos" 2003 Amor real Manuel Fuentes Guerra Protagonist 2005/06 Alborada Luis Manrique y Arellano Protagonist 2007–2008 Pasión Ricardo de Salamanca y Almonte/"El Antillano" Protagonist 2008–2009 Mañana es para siempre Eduardo Juárez Cruz / Franco Santoro Protagonist 2010 Soy tu dueña José Miguel Montesinos Protagonist 2012–2013 Porque el amor manda Jesús García Protagonist 2015–2016 Pasión y Poder Eladio Gómez Luna Protagonist/Antagonist ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican television actors
